SELECT R.RESERIDX, R.HOSIDX, R.USERIDX, R.PETIDX, R.RESERDATE, R.RESERTIME, R.MEMO, R.CONDITION, R.GUARDIAN, R.GUARDIANPHONE, H.HOSNAME, P.PETNAME FROM RESERVATION R, HOSPITAL H, MYPET P WHERE RESERIDX = #{reserIdx} AND R.HOSIDX = H.HOSIDX AND R.PETIDX = P.PETIDX
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERIDX, HOSIDX, USERIDX, PETIDX, RESERDATE, RESERTIME, MEMO, CONDITION, GUARDIAN, GUARDIANPHONE) VALUES (SEQ_RESERIDX.NEXTVAL, #{hosIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{petIdx}, #{reserDate}, #{reserTime}, #{memo}, 'RESERVATION', #{guardian}, #{guardianPhone})
SELECT SEQ_RESERIDX.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT R.*, H.HOSNAME HOSNAME, P.PETNAME PETNAME FROM RESERVATION R, HOSPITAL H, MYPET P WHERE R.USERIDX = #{userIdx} AND R.RESERDATE >= SYSDATE-1 AND R.HOSIDX = H.HOSIDX AND R.PETIDX = P.PETIDX AND R.CONDITION = 'RESERVATION' ORDER BY RESERDATE ) T

SELECT ROWNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT R.*, H.HOSNAME HOSNAME, P.PETNAME PETNAME FROM RESERVATION R, HOSPITAL H, MYPET P WHERE R.USERIDX = #{userIdx} AND R.HOSIDX = H.HOSIDX AND R.PETIDX = P.PETIDX AND R.CONDITION='FINISH' ORDER BY RESERDATE DESC) T
SELECT ROWNUM, R.*, H.HOSNAME HOSNAME, P.PETNAME PETNAME FROM RESERVATION R, HOSPITAL H, MYPET P WHERE R.USERIDX = #{hosIdx} AND R.HOSIDX = H.HOSIDX AND R.PETIDX = P.PETIDX AND R.CONDITION='CANCLE'
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERDATE = #{reserDate}, RESERTIME = #{reserTime}, MEMO = #{memo}, GUARDIAN = #{guardian}, GUARDIANPHONE = #{guardianPhone} WHERE RESERIDX = #{reserIdx}
